sourcesContent:
Sélectionnez des cours.

Language : {{ training.name }}

{{ training.description }}

Price: {{ training.price }}

Quantity: {{ training.quantity }}

{{ error }}

import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Training } from 'src/app/models/training'; import { TrainingService } from 'src/app/services/training/training.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-trainings', templateUrl: './trainings.component.html', styleUrls: ['./trainings.component.css'], }) export class TrainingsComponent implements OnInit { trainings: Training[] = []; error!: string; constructor(private trainingService: TrainingService) {} ngOnInit() { this.trainingService.getTrainings().subscribe({ next: (data: Training[]) => { this.trainings = data; }, error: (error) => { this.error = "Une erreur s'est produite lors du chargement des articles. /n" + error; }, }); } }
